(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Found)
      (NP (DT another) (NN place)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB have)
              (NP (DT a)
                (ADJP (RB really) (JJ nice))
                (NN hamburger)))))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Found-1)
det(place-3, another-2)
dobj(Found-1, place-3)
aux(have-5, to-4)
infmod(place-3, have-5)
det(hamburger-9, a-6)
advmod(nice-8, really-7)
amod(hamburger-9, nice-8)
dobj(have-5, hamburger-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This) (NN burger))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (ADVP (RB probably))
      (VP (VBN got)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (JJ juiciest)
            (CC and)
            (JJ beefy) (NN pattie))
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP (PRP I))
              (VP (VBP have)
                (VP (VBN had))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP insist)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (DT any) (NN self) (VBG respecting) (NN burger))
          (VP (MD should)
            (VP (VB be)
              (VP (VBN made)
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (JJ chopped) (NN beef)))
                (PP (RB rather)
                  (FRAG (RB then) (JJ mince)))))))))
    (. .)))

          (NP (JJ near) (NNP Bedok) (NNP Fire) (NNP Station))

        (NP (NNP Mondays) (NNP Lunch) (NNPS 12pm))
        (: -)))))

nn(Closed-16, Burong-9)
amod(Station-14, near-11)
nn(Station-14, Bedok-12)
nn(Station-14, Fire-13)
appos(Closed-16, Station-14)
dep(Pub-3, Closed-16)
prep(Closed-16, on-17)
nn(12pm-20, Mondays-18)
nn(12pm-20, Lunch-19)
pobj(on-17, 12pm-20)


(ROOT
  (NP (JJ 3pm) (NNS ,)))


amod(,-2, 3pm-1)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Dinner) (NNPS 6pm) (: -)))


nn(6pm-2, Dinner-1)
root(ROOT-0, 6pm-2)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (CD 12) (NN midnight))
    (ADJP (VBN Closed)
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP (NNP Mondays) (CD 64453110))))))


num(midnight-2, 12-1)
root(ROOT-0, midnight-2)
dep(midnight-2, Closed-3)
prep(Closed-3, on-4)
pobj(on-4, Mondays-5)
num(Mondays-5, 64453110-6)
